page.title: 01GAZETTEER
page.content: The area is a pleasant{agricultural} community split in half by the{River {Severn.}There is little need these days for many Farm Labourers because of modern machinery. The{climate}is generally mild but because of the rural setting and lack of{public transport}severe winters can bring feelings of isolation. The{population}of the area is around a few hundred,mostly middle-aged who are either farmers or have moved here to live in the peace and quiet of the countryside away from towns.The younger generation need to go to nearby towns like{Gloucester}and{ {Stroud} to find entertainment. The major attraction of the area is the{River Severn}which offers the local people and visitors social and leisure pursuits.
